The photo was published on Twitter on Ju: 2020, with a Hindi-language caption mentioning a hospital in Muzaffarpur and congratulating Nitish Kumar.
The term: bhakta" used in the caption refers to religious devotees and is commonly used in India to refer to followers of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his Bharatiya Janata Party.
The photo was shared on multiple social: 4. A reverse image search revealed that the same photo was published in a news report in December 2017, showing stray dogs occupying beds in a government hospital in Muzaffarpur.
